name: RISK & DOOM
description:
"Oh, it's our lucky day! You have a disc instead of a head! Could you get the plateau free of all of those pumpkins? The faster, the better. Much obliged..." *evil laugh*

Destroy all the pumpkins as fast as you can without falling off the platform! You can use your disc to cut them in half or jump on top of them. Once there is no more threats, the timer will stop. How well did you do?

CONTROLS

Move - WASD / Arrows / Left Joystick

Jump and Confirm - SPACE / A Button
